short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mod Menuz Extention provides you customized background to your new tab For game lovers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mod Menuz - New Tab Background extension provide you with Mod Menuz background in new tab page. Created for Games fans.

This extension features some of the best artwork to make you feel good on your Chrome browser. 

Choose your favorite Mod Menuz backgrounds from a variety of designs in new tab page. Install this  chrome extension and experience the great design in your browser new tab page.

The Mod Menuz extension is still available for Windows and PC.
